occupation: Graduate Teaching Assistant at Illinois Institute of Technology
headline: Graduate Teaching Assistant at Illinois Institute of Technology | Ex-SWE at OpenText

experiences.title: Graduate Teaching Assistant
experiences.description:
Teaching Assistant for Course CS-587: Software Project Management

Managed and supported over 150 students in Software Project Management, providing guidance on assignment preparation and grading their work, demonstrating strong organizational and leadership skills.

Utilized python and data retrieval techniques to fetch data from GitHub and Stack Overflow for the top 10 repositories. Computed and inserted this data into an EdgeDB database and illustrated their relationships using NetworkX.

Designed and implemented a robust data pipeline for creating a Knowledge Graph, effectively extracting and processing data from GitHub and StackOverflow to identify common issues across repositories, thereby increasing user experience and reducing redundancy.

experiences.title: Associate Software Engineer
experiences.description:
Developed and implemented pagination for 20+ Teamsite screens, improving user experience and performance.

Collaborated with teammates to reduce backlog bug count by 70%.

Excelled in a high-pressure Customer Problem Escalation (CPE) environment, rapidly debugging and releasing patches to resolve critical customer issues, within 24 hours, on average, and preventing major customer escalations.

Identified and resolved a critical performance issue through Java parallel streams implementation.

experiences.title: Intern
experiences.description:
Automated form creation by systematically parsing XML data and assembling form elements using Selenium, streamlining the process.

Delivered informative presentations to Directors, showcasing the intricacies of data retrieval and the efficiency of automated form creation methods.

experiences.title: Intern
experiences.description:
Engineered Python scripts to facilitate data flow between a server and an IoT device using the "publish-subscribe" architecture of MQ Telemetry Transport.

Built real-time streaming data pipelines with Apache Kafka, ensuring efficient data transmission and processing.

Designed and implemented high-performance data ingestion pipelines using Apache NiFi for real-time processing and routing of data from various sources.

certifications.name: Clustering Geolocation Data Intelligently in Python
Front-End Web UI Frameworks and Tools: Bootstrap 4
